vision.title: The Bookmate Vision
vision.description: Bookmate will revolutionize how you discover romance novels. Our AI-powered matching system will analyze your reading preferences, romantic fantasies, and emotional triggers to recommend books that will truly resonate with your heart.

features.title: What Bookmate Will Offer:
features.personalized: Personalized book recommendations based on your romantic preferences
features.matching: Advanced matching algorithm that understands your emotional needs
features.community: Community features for readers and authors to connect
features.insights: Reading insights and analytics for authors
features.early: Early access to beta features and exclusive content
